Name: Baboon and falcon
Description: Pendant with strong Greek influence depicting a squatting baboon and a human-headed falcon, i.e. a "soul". The ape is resting his hands on his knees and is wearing a collar with an amulet around his neck. On his back is a ring pierced vertically. The falcon is joined to the right knee of the baboon. This remarkable arrangement must in some way be connected with the funerary cult.
